info.title: WebApplicationFirewallManagement
info.description: APIs to manage web application firewall rules.

get.description: Gets all the WAF policies in a subscription.
Lists available Ssl options for configuring Ssl policy.
Lists all SSL predefined policies for configuring Ssl policy.
Gets Ssl predefined policy with the specified policy name.

parameters.name: predefinedPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the ssl predefined policy.

get.description: Lists all available web application firewall rule sets.
Gets all the application gateways in a subscription.
Gets the regional application gateway waf manifest.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location for which the WAF dynamic manifest is requested.

get.description: Gets the regional application gateway waf manifest.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location for which the WAF dynamic manifest is requested.

get.description: Lists all of the protection policies within a resource group.
Retrieve protection policy with specified name within a resource group.

parameters.name: policyName
parameters.description: The name of the policy.

put.description: Creates or update policy with specified rule set name within a resource group.

parameters.name: policyName
parameters.description: The name of the policy.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Policy to be created.

parameters.name: policyName
parameters.description: The name of the policy.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

get.description: Lists all application gateways in a resource group.

parameters.name: applicationGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the application gateway.

put.description: Creates or updates the specified application gateway.

parameters.name: applicationGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the application gateway.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update application gateway operation.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: A link to the status monitor

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

patch.description: Updates the specified application gateway tags.

parameters.name: applicationGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the application gateway.

parameters.description: Parameters supplied to update application gateway tags.

parameters.name: applicationGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the application gateway.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

post.description: Gets the backend health of the specified application gateway in a resource group.

parameters.name: applicationGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the application gateway.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expands BackendAddressPool and BackendHttpSettings referenced in backend health.

post.description: Gets the backend health for given combination of backend pool and http setting of the specified application gateway in a resource group.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expands BackendAddressPool and BackendHttpSettings referenced in backend health.
